kiwi.ui
Class SimpleStyledEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JEditorPane
                      javax.swing.JTextPane
                          kiwi.ui.SimpleStyledEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleStyledEditor
extends javax.swing.JTextPane

A simple text editor that supports styles like bold, italic, and underline, and that is able to render embedded markup using proxies.


An example SimpleStyledEditor.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
SimpleEditor, Serialized Form
